What is Neo

Neo is a small module aimed at reading a skills matrix in the format of excel sheet. It allows you to visualise group-level skills and individual skills as well.

How to get started?

To make Neo work you need to:

  • Install it. For that you need to have a look at Installation

  • Get your skills matrix in the right format. This is explained here: Input file
